parrier.midnightconfig.gameFreezeRangeCo: §7The range in which players will be affected by the game freeze
parrier.midnightconfig.parryStrengthComm: §7When you parry a projectile, it's velocity will be multiplied by this amount.
parrier.midnightconfig.reParryComment: §7If enabled, you will be able to parry projectiles multiple times.
parrier.midnightconfig.backParryComment: §7If enabled, projectiles will be sent towards their owner (Entity who shot the projectile) if that exists.
parrier.midnightconfig.title: Parrier
